cards.name: An Unshakable Mind
cards.text: When Revealed: Discard each attachment from play.

cards.name: A War Without Banners
cards.text: When revealed: Kneel each player's faction card

cards.name: King's Landing Smuggler
cards.text: Interrupt: When King's Landing Smuggler leaves play, choose another card in play. Place 1 gold from the treasury to that card.

cards.name: Gulltown
cards.text: +1 Income. -1 Initiative.

cards.name: Beron Blacktyde
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Beron Blacktyde, retun a [Greyjoy] character from your dead pile to your hand.

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: While you control Euron Crow's Eye, he gains insight. Interrupt: When a character you control discard a card using pillage, kneel Silence to discard 2 cards instead

cards.name: Lady Whiskers
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). 
If attached character is Tommen Baratheon, he gains insight. 
Attached character gains stealth.

cards.name: Lion's Retribution
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, look at an opponent's hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile instead.(Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Obella Sand
cards.text: Interrupt: When Obella Sand leaves play, choose and opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each Sand Snake character you control gains that challenge icon.

cards.name: Brimstone
cards.text: Each Sand Snake character you control gets +1 STR. Action: Kneel Brimstone to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Clubfoot Karl
cards.text: Stealth. Forced Reaction: After Clubfoot Karl enters play, choose and kill a character you control.

cards.name: Greyguard
cards.text: Action: Kneel Greyguard to choose a [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains "immune to opponent's character abilities."

cards.name: Bolton Marauders
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, Bolton Marauders gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Grey Wind
cards.text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains intimidate. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, remove Grey Wind from the game to choose and kill a character with STR 3 or lower.

cards.name: Ser Vortimer Crane
cards.text: Each Knight character you control gets +1 STR.

cards.name: Knight's Honor
cards.text: Knight character you control only. Attached character gets +1 STR and gains renown

cards.name: Grey Worm
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While an opponent controls more characters than you, Grey Worm does not kneel when declared as a defender.

cards.name: Shavepates
cards.text: No attachments. Interrupt: When Shavepates leaves play, choose an attachment in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

cards.name: Smuggling Vessel
cards.text: Action: Kneel a Smuggler character and Smuggling Vessel to choose and kneel a location.

cards.name: The Support of the Iron Bank
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of each [baratheon] non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 1.

cards.name: Battle of Castle Black
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a challenge type and may initiate an additional challenge of the choosen type during the challenge phase until you reveal a new plot card.

cards.name: Support for the Wall
cards.text: Each Army character gets +1 STR. Challenge Action: Choose and stand an Army character. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Ser Vardis Egen
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While Ser Vardis Egen is standing, he is considered to be participating in each challenge in which you control another defending House Arryn character.

cards.name: Not Today
cards.text: Interrupt: When a unique character you control would be killed, place it in its owner's discard pile instead of placing it in its owner's dead pile. Then, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a character with the same title and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Euron's Armor
cards.text: Unique [greyjoy] character only. Immune to events." Interrupt: When attached character would be killed or returned to hand, kneel Euron's Armor to save it.

cards.name: Foamdrinker
cards.text: While you control Dagmer Cleftjaw, he gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Foamdrinker and choose a [Greyjoy] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains pillage

cards.name: Redsmiths
cards.text: Shadow (2). Stealth. Reaction: After Redsmiths comes out of shadows, choose a character with STR 1 or lower, and return that character to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Ser Boros Blount
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Ser Boros Blount enters play, search your deck for a Kingsguard character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Put it into play instead if you control King character. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it.)

cards.name: Anders Yronwood
cards.text: Insight. Renown. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, Anders Yronwood gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Manticore Venom
cards.text: Taxation Action: Place a poison token on a character with printed cost 4 or lower. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Deep Lake
cards.text: Challenge Action: Kneel Deep Lake to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation and loses all other faction affiliations.

cards.name: The Light that Brings the Dawn
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, choose a non-unique character. Stand that character and take control of it until the end of the phase (Max 1 per challenge).

cards.name: Rickard Karstark
cards.text: Renown If there is a Winter plot card revealed, Rickard Karstark does not kneel when declared as an attacker.

cards.name: Barrowton
cards.text: Reaction: After a card you control is sacrificed, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Willas Tyrell
cards.text: Insight Reaction: After you draw a loyal card using insight, reveal it to have Willas Tyrell gain 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Three Towers
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, kneel Three Towers to give that character -3 STR until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Sons of the Harpy
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Sons of the Harpy enters play, choose an attachment and discard it from play.

cards.name: Meereen's Pyramid
cards.text: Action: Kneel Meereen's Pyramid to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character is killed if its STR is 0.

cards.name: Gilbert Farring
cards.text: While you have more power on your faction card than each opponent, Gilbert Farring gets +2 STR and gains renown.

cards.name: One Realm, One God, One King
cards.text: Standing Action: Kneel each character with STR 2 or lower.

cards.name: Moonsingers
cards.text: You cannot include more than 5 limited cards in your deck. Reaction: After you place 1 or more non-power token on a card, if it has 2 or less tokens of that type kneel your faction card to place 2 additional tokens of the same type. Action: Kneel your faction card to discard a token from a character you control.

cards.name: City Festival
cards.text: When revealed: Gain 2 gold. (Gain 4 gold instead if there is a City plot card in you used pile.)

cards.name: Maester Colemon
cards.text: Insight. Action: Choose an attachment, until the end of the phase, treat that card as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: The Evenstar
cards.text: Renown. Action: After you play a Song event, stand The Evenstar. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: King Balon's Host
cards.text: No Attachments. Pillage. While you are the first player, King Balon's Host gets +4STR. Reaction: After King Balon's Host enters play, discard the top 1 card from each ooponent's deck. (3 cards instead if there is a War plot card revealed.)

cards.name: Invasion of the Arbor
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose a location with printed cost X or lower in an opponent´s discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Ser Jacelyn Bywater
cards.text: Renown. Ser Jacelyn Bywater does not kneel when declared as a defender against an opponent with fewer cards in his or her hand than you. Forced reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Ser Jacerlyn Bywater.

cards.name: Castamere
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenge phase, kneel castamere to return it to its owner´s hand

cards.name: Mellario of Norvos
cards.text:
Insight.
Reduce the cost to ambush your cards by 1

cards.name: Discouraged
cards.text:
Shadow (2). Terminal. 
Attached character loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.

cards.name: Left Hand Lew
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action:Kneel Left Hand Lew to choose and stand a character owned by an opponent.

cards.name: Old Steward
cards.text: +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Greywater Watch
cards.text: Action:Kneel Greywater Watch to choose a [stark] character you control, and kneel that character to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: "The Winter Maid"
cards.text: Action:Kneel your faction card. Until the end of phase, your revealed plot card gains the Winter trait Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Moryn Tyrell
cards.text: Renown. While you control 3 or more The Reach location, Moryn Tyrell gets +2 STR. Reaction:After Moryn Tyrell enters play, search your deck for a The Reach location, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: We Light The Way
cards.text: Play only during a challenge in which a tyrell character you control is participating alone. Action:Until the end of the challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1. (Max 1 per challenge).

cards.name: Tyrion Lannister
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction:After 1 or more [targaryen] cards are discarded from your hand by a card effect, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase).

cards.name: Dragon Fear
cards.text: Terminal. While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets -2 STR if you control a Dragon character.

cards.name: The Giantslayer
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction:After you win a challenge in which The Giantslayer is participating, choose and kill a character you contro1 to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challnege. (Limit once per phase).

cards.name: Crown of the Iron Throne
cards.text: Unique [baratheon] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Attached character contributes its STR to its controller total dominance even while kneeling.

cards.name: City of Shadow
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose up to 2 cards in your hand and place them facedown in shadows with a shadow token on them. While those cards are in shadows, if they do not have the printed shadow keyword, they gain shadow (X). X is their printed card cost.

cards.name: The Hand's Reign
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After a player plays an event, that player's opponents may draw 1 card and gain 1 power for his or her faction.

cards.name: Evenfall Hall
cards.text: Reaction:After you play a Song event, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round).

cards.name: Big, Black Tomcat
cards.text: Non-loyal unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (2). Attached character gains a [power] icon and intimidate.Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, sacrifice Big, Black Tomcat.

cards.name: Falia Flowers
cards.text: Interrupt:When a Warship location leaves play, sacrifice Falia Flowers to return that location to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Orkmont
cards.text: Interrupt:When you compare initiative, kneel Orkmont to give your revealed plot card +1 initiative until the end of the phase (+3 initiative instead if that plot card has the Winter trait). Then, if you win initiative, draw 1 card from the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Host of the Lion
cards.text: Intimidate. No Attachments. While Host of the Lion is attacking an opponent with fewer cards in his or her hand than you, it gets +4 STR. Action:Pay 3 gold to stand Host of the Lion. (Limit twice per phase)

cards.name: Boots
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
Attached character gains a [military] icon and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

cards.name: Ser Myles Manwoody
cards.text: While you are not the first player, Ser Myles Manwoody does not kneel when declared as an attacker.

cards.name: Planky Town
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Planky Town to choose an attachment you control. Return that attachment to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Iron Emmett
cards.text: Intimidate. No Attachments except Weapon.

cards.name: Builder's Hammer
cards.text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is defending, kneel Builder's Hammer and discard 1 gold from it to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [thenightswatch] location or attachment, reveal it and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Barbrey Dustin
cards.text: While Barbrey Dustin is standing, players cannot trigger abilities on Maester characters.

cards.name: Bastard's Boys
cards.text: Forced reaction:After you win a challenge in which Bastard's Boys is participating, sacrifice Bastard's Boys.

cards.name: Alaric of Eysen
cards.text: Reaction:After Alaric of Eysen enters play, search your deck for a Song event, reveal it and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Redwyne Fleet
cards.text: Reaction:After you win a challenge in which you control a character that is attacking or defending alone, sacrifice Redwyne Fleet to choose and stand that character. Gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Rylona Rhee
cards.text: Reaction:After a Song event is placed in your discard pile, pay 1 gold to shuffle it into your deck.

cards.name: Born out of fire
cards.text: Limited. Action:Reduce the cost of the first Dragon character you marshal or ambush this phase by 4.

cards.name: Lewys the Fishwife
cards.text: Ambush (3). Reaction:After Lewis the Fishwife enters play, choose a Lord or Lady character with power. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Storm's End
cards.text: Reaction:After a character or location card you control gains power, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round).
